about_the_game:
◆Story

I am a demon hunter, a real demon hunter who graduated from the Goblin Management Department of Southern Heavenly Gate Professional College in 1996.
Thirty years ago, when I was looking forward to starting my new life, having finally made up all my credits through a series of remedial exams, I was shocked to discover a truth that shattered all my perceptions...
As a god, I actually lost my job!

One day in Heaven, one year on Earth, humanity's technological progress over the last two hundred years has been as fast as a rocket and completely beyond the control of the Heavenly Court.When the Heavenly Court's knowledge of Earth was still in its infancy, and men were still ploughing and women were still weaving, humans had already invented aeroplanes to take to the skies, and this frightened everyone in the Heavenly Court. Fortunately, the Senior Divine Guards were able to cast spells in time to hide the Heavenly Court and prevent any major accidents.



At the same time, those demons and devils who once acted rebelliously have lost their absolute power over humans and have degenerated to the point where they hide and struggle to survive, and there is no need for the Heavenly Court to send demon hunters to carry out the so-called management of goblins.However, due to poor management, backwardness, or the fact that the school's leadership simply did not care and did not implement curriculum reforms in a timely manner, a group of us common gods still graduated from the Department of Leprechaun Management.And then 。。。。。。 We were thrown from top to bottom, and the damn counsellor just left one sentence on his way out, saying that he should not return to the Heavenly Court until he had cultivated the Source of Blessing.

We hate to gnash our teeth, but there is nothing we can do, so we pretend to be Taoist priests, monks, fortune-tellers, the dancing god., with a few blindfolds, the days are not bad, so we slowly integrate into human society and live a few decades of leisure.

Thirty years later, the demons have refused to lie dormant and have reappeared out of nowhere. Hey, hey, hey, the time for demon hunters has finally come again! But I'm a poor wizard, and I've been lazing around for so long that I've forgotten everything I've learned in the past, so I have no choice but to try this AK I bought on the Internet. It would be better if I could catch some little demons and have sex with them.

◆Gameplay

Collect all sorts of weapons and spells, defeat and subjugate the elven leaders, and have sex with them once you've subjugated them.

◆Game Features

◇Wide variety of levels and terrain.
◇A wealth of traditional and new types of magical weapons
◇Interesting dialogues
◇Various types of sexy H-items

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

◆Story

I am a demon hunter, a real demon hunter who graduated from the Goblin Management Department of Southern Heavenly Gate Professional College in 1996.
Thirty years ago, when I was looking forward to starting my new life, having finally made up all my credits through a series of remedial exams, I was shocked to discover a truth that shattered all my perceptions...
As a god, I actually lost my job!

One day in Heaven, one year on Earth, humanity's technological progress over the last two hundred years has been as fast as a rocket and completely beyond the control of the Heavenly Court.When the Heavenly Court's knowledge of Earth was still in its infancy, and men were still ploughing and women were still weaving, humans had already invented aeroplanes to take to the skies, and this frightened everyone in the Heavenly Court. Fortunately, the Senior Divine Guards were able to cast spells in time to hide the Heavenly Court and prevent any major accidents.



At the same time, those demons and devils who once acted rebelliously have lost their absolute power over humans and have degenerated to the point where they hide and struggle to survive, and there is no need for the Heavenly Court to send demon hunters to carry out the so-called management of goblins.However, due to poor management, backwardness, or the fact that the school's leadership simply did not care and did not implement curriculum reforms in a timely manner, a group of us common gods still graduated from the Department of Leprechaun Management.And then 。。。。。。 We were thrown from top to bottom, and the damn counsellor just left one sentence on his way out, saying that he should not return to the Heavenly Court until he had cultivated the Source of Blessing.

name: Demon Hunting Diary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Internet scams and the badger game are just two of the many incidents that have shattered this rare moment of relaxation. It must be that the demons have come out to wreak havoc on the world again. When the new magic weapon I bought on the Internet arrives, I'll capture you all to have sex with me!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Traditional Chinese
